DOC.brief_summary: The present study include randomized clinical trial peer health education intervention 12-month longitudinal study . The sample include Black Men Sex Men ( MSM ) randomize experimental control condition ask recruit peer risk network member HIV test 3 month period . Some network member recruit voluntary counseling testing ( VCT ) enroll longitudinal study assessment . Both index network participant assess baseline , 6 , 12-months . The specific aim propose study : 1 . Train Black MSM ( index participant experimental condition ) conduct peer health education , promote VCT HIV risk reduction among social network member , recruit social network member VCT . 2 . Examine change HIV risk behavior VCT among index participant network member experimental intervention compare control condition . 3 . Examine mediate effect social environment ( network , social norm ) HIV risk behavior VCT , among indexes network member . 4 . Examine mediate effect individual level factor ( substance use depression ) HIV risk behavior VCT among indexes network member .
DOC.brief_title: Social Networks Prevention HIV Care Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective fund research conduct randomize control trial experimental behavioral intervention train African American men sex men ( AA MSM ) 1 ) conduct peer health education , 2 ) promote HIV risk reduction among social network member , 3 ) promote HIV voluntary counseling testing ( VCT ) among social network member 4 ) recruit social network member VCT . Index participant African American/Black men sex men ( MSM ) randomize either peer education intervention comparison condition . After baseline complete , index participant refer social network member ( i.e . network participant ) research clinic HIV antibody test . In addition , subset network participant participate longitudinal portion study .
DOC.criteria: Eligibility criterion index include : ( ) sex male partner within prior 90 day ; ( b ) selfreported Black African American race/ethnicity ; ( c ) selfreported biological male sex birth ; ( ) identify male ; ( e ) unprotected vaginal anal sex within prior 90 day ; ( f ) age 18 older ; ( g ) willingness attend intervention session ; ( h ) willingness discus HIV prevention encourage VCT among network member ; ( ) reside Baltimore city surround county ; ( j ) planning move Baltimore city surround county within next year ; ( k ) involve behavioral intervention HIV prevention within prior five year . Eligibility network member receive VCT : ( ) Provide study coupon verify refer index participant ( b ) age 18 older . Eligibility criteria network member enrol longitudinal study : ( ) age 18 older ; ( b ) recruit index participant engage VCT clinic ; ( c ) either current sex partner index ( male female ) Black MSM peer ( operationalized selfreported black African American reporting sex man prior 90 day ) ( ) one follow risk behavior prior 90 day : unprotected vaginal anal sex , diagnose STI , sex 2 people . Exclusion criterion index include previously enrol study network participant . Exclusion criterion network participant include previously enrol study index participant .
